Start an nREPL
M-x cider-jack-in
Compile this file/load current buffer
C-c C-k
Run your tests
C-c C-,
Evaluate the form preceding point and display the result in the echo area. If invoked with a prefix argument, insert the result into the current buffer.
C-x C-e
Display doc string for symbol under string
C-c C-d
Display the source for the symbol at point
C-c C-s
Jump to the definition of a symbol
M-.
Return to your pre-jump location
M-,
Complete the symbol at point
M-TAB
Interrupt any pending evaluations
C-c C-b
Load a file
C-c C-l
Interrupt any pending evaluations
C-c C-b
